job.title: Senior PE (Multifamily Builder, $50+ MIL Annual Volume)
job.description: If you are a Senior Project Engineer looking to grow your career with a locallyfocused and growing General Contractor with an established book of business  please read onltbrgtltbrgtTop Reasons to Work with UsltbrgtltbrgtSince 2004 we have grown to become the General Contractor of choice for private and public sector clients alike We are a tightknit group with the ability to take on larger complex project but also offer the personalized experience and customized approach of a smaller firm With an annual revenue in the at 50 MIL we may not be the biggest name in the industry but our customtailored approach to each project and passion in multifamily construction specifically within the affordable housing space has made us one of the most trusted names in the greater Sacramento region for over 15 years We are currently expanding our teams with future projects in preconstruction and seeking a seniorlevel Project Manager with strong vertical construction experience within commercial and multifamily constructionltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be Doingltbrgtltulgtltligt Write RFIs Request for Information and expedite answers for efficient responsesltligtltligt Know and understand the subcontract documents as they apply to assigned areas of responsibilityltligtltligt Process Submittals and follow thru with approvalsltligtltligt Have working knowledge of project schedulesltligtltligt Expedite shop drawings submittals and safety requirements for assigned tasks Utilize the Project Management system for shop drawing administration Supply required submittal information such as field dimensionsltligtltligt Request and follow up on project submittals required from Subcontractors and distribute to appropriate personsltligtltligt Prepare and maintain all LEED documentationltligtltligt Procure materials andor equipment as instructed by Project Managerltligtltligt Receive and distribute information on clarification and changes in the work for areas of responsibility Obtain and check subcontractors pricing and assist in assembling change order requests as directed by the Project Managerltligtltligt Assist in documenting changes maintain project records red line transfers and correspondenceltligtltligt Review and respond to correspondence to and from subcontractors and vendors for assigned tasksltligtltligt Prepare and distribute meeting minutes as directed by Project managerltligtltligt Be a leader in open communication with team members Promote good relations with all partiesltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt Bachelors Degree in Construction Management Engineering Architecture or related field of studyltligtltligt 3 years of GClevel experience in multifamily construction preferably with demonstrated experience on projects up to 20 MIL or 100 unitsltligtltligt 1year minimum field experience on ground up slabongrade podium and other multiunit residential projectsltligtltligt Proficient computer skills including Microsoft Office Word Excel Outlook P6 MS Project or other CPM Scheduling Software Procore or similar project management softwareltligtltligt Knowledge of building systems construction processes and pricingltligtltligt Strong Leadership AbilitiesltbrgtltligtltulgtWhats In It for Youltbrgtltulgtltligt Competitive Base Salary Depending On Experienceltligtltligt Performance ampamp Companybased Bonusltligtltligt Medical Dental Vision Benefitsltligtltligt 3 Weeks PTOltligtltligt 401k w matchltligtltligt Car Allowance and Gas CardltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a Project Engineer with leadership experience in highdensity multifamily construction please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may
